pages.text: Using the $(l:innovation/mechpower/hand_crank)hand crank$() to manually power my machines is incredibly exhausting and time-consuming.$(br2)If I can tame horses out in the wild, they can produce much greater power for my machines.$(br)That would save me time to do other things as well.
Once I've tamed a horse, I can attach the horse to the presser or grindstone with a lead, and they'll start powering it while there are items to be processed.
